attributes.action: Resign and hold a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I had no say in my new Prime Minister and they call this a democracy (God save Iraq)! I didn't vote for Tony and I won't vote for Gordon but I'd like my vote counted. Brown should resign and go to the country to let the electorate decide who has a mandate to govern the country.

Personally I'm not that bothered who wins but we should have the option to vote in our PM.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
